A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went against in universe logic\, killed character portraits that have been build up over the saga\, plotline driven my outside political motivators\, very poor dialogue\, nonsensical scenes\, very cheap humor breaks attention from dramatic moments and worse if all\, they turned their back against the most loyal fan base in pop culture history. I hope disney learned their lesson after this catastrophe with the plummeting reviews and failure at the box office.
